lead_paragraph: Representative John Salazar and his challenger Scott Tipton in Colorado’s Third Congressional District have a get-out-the-vote challenge in a sprawling district.
snippet: Representative John Salazar and his challenger Scott Tipton in Colorado’s Third Congressional District have a get-out-the-vote challenge in a sprawling district.

headline.main: Pledging Independence to Voters Here and Yon
headline.seo: John Salazar and Scott Tipton Battle for Congress
headline.print_headline: Pledging Independence To Voters Here and Yon
